title: Space Perspective acquires ship for ocean-based balloon launch platform
summary: Space Perspective, a company offering tourist flights into the stratosphere, is buying a ship it plans to use as an oceangoing launch platform for its balloons.

title: Kayhan and Morpheus offer “one-click” collision avoidance
summary: Kayhan Space and Morpheus Space announced a strategic partnership Nov. 15 to offer satellite operators a “one-click” collision-avoidance service.

title: Benchmark expands staff and facilities to meet demand
summary: Benchmark Space Systems has nearly tripled its staff and established manufacturing facilities to produce as many as 1,000 engines in the United States and United Kingdom over five years.

title: NASA continues with Artemis 1 launch attempt after evaluating hurricane damage
summary: NASA is proceeding with its next Artemis 1 launch attempt on Nov. 16 after concluding that loose caulk on the Orion spacecraft did not pose a significant risk.

title: ClearSpace announces life extension collaboration with Intelsat
summary: ClearSpace, the Swiss orbital debris removal startup, said Nov. 14 it is planning a mission to extend the life of an Intelsat satellite before it runs out of fuel around 2026-2028.
